title: Cranberry and pecan cookies in a jar
ingredients: ['80g plain flour', '40g porridge oats', '60g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '60g dried cranberries', '85g white chocolate chips', '60g chopped pecans']
